<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_444</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_444</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Lógica digital</string>
            <string language="en">Digital logic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Digital Logik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Logique de Digital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lógica de Digital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Logica di Digital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ψηφιακή λογική</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunos conceptos de lógica digital. Se estudia el álgebra de Boole y aplicaciones a circuitos digitales sencillos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain some of the concepts in digital logic. It studies Boole's algebra and its application to simple digital circuits.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lógica</string>
            <string language="en">logic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">digital</string>
            <string language="en">digital</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">circuitos</string>
            <string language="en">circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tablas de verdad</string>
            <string language="en">truth tables</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">álgebra de Boole</string>
            <string language="en">Boole's algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, einige der Konzepte in der digitalen Logik zu erklären.
Sie studiert Algebra und seine Anwendung Booles zu den einfachen
Digitalschaltungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer certains des concepts dans la logique 
digitale. Elle étudie l'algèbre et son application de Boole 
aux circuits digitaux simples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
alguns dos conceitos na lógica digital. Estuda a sua 
aplicação de Boole a álgebra e aos circuitos digitais simples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare alcuni dei concetti nella logica digitale. Studia 
l'algebra e la relativa applicazione del Boole ai circuiti digitali 
semplici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει μερικών από τις έννοιες στην ψηφιακή λογική. 
Μελετά την άλγεβρα Μπουλ και την αίτησή της στα απλά 
ψηφιακά κυκλώματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">digital</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stromkreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahrheit Tabellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Algebra Booles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">digital</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tables de vérité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'algèbre de Boole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lógica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">digital</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Algebra del Boole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
